Text:
Great band! Tip: next time add the name of the band in the torrent title (same goes for your other Anberlin and Soulfly torrents - or wasnt that you?). Anyone searching for "anberlin friendship" will not find this torrent.
Oh, and lastly: there already are 2 of these on TPB. IMO, it's better to just help share those. It is, of course, your choice :)
